mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.classnumber AS "classnumber", a.spart AS "spart", a.rname AS "rname", a.position AS "position", a.type AS "type", a.room AS "room", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_classroom( id, classnumber, spart, rname, position, type, room, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( default, #{classnumber}, #{spart}, #{rname}, #{position}, #{type}, #{room}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_classroom SET classnumber = #{classnumber}, spart = #{spart}, rname = #{rname}, position = #{position}, type = #{type}, room = #{room}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
